articles.title: Honeybees Suffer Unnecessarily in Human-Made Hives, Study Finds - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Honeybees in man-made hives may have been suffering the cold unnecessarily for over a century because commercial hive designs are based on erroneous science, my new research shows.
